message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to start with an offer of $180. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit, so I can't go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer with $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll counteroffer with $155. That's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $145. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I really need to make a sale, so I'll make one last concession. I'll counteroffer with $152. That's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $142. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I've already made several concessions, Bob. I'm starting to think it's time to move on. I'll make one final offer: $148. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options. This is my last offer.

I understand you're making your last offer, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to meet you at $140. If you're not willing to accept this, I'll have to consider other options, including buying from a competitor.
